trans-unit.source: Contains information about how bitmap and metafile colors are manipulated during rendering.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关在呈现过程中如何操作位图和图元文件颜色的信息。

trans-unit.source: An ImageAttributes object maintains several color-adjustment settings, including color-adjustment matrices, grayscale-adjustment matrices, gamma-correction values, color-map tables, and color-threshold values.
trans-unit.target: ImageAttributes 对象维护多个颜色调整设置，包括颜色调整矩阵、 灰度调整矩阵、 灰度校正值、 颜色映射表和颜色阈值的值。

trans-unit.source: During rendering, colors can be corrected, darkened, lightened, and removed.
trans-unit.target: 呈现过程中，颜色可以更正、 变暗，变亮，并且删除。

trans-unit.source: To apply such manipulations, initialize an ImageAttributes object and pass the path of that ImageAttributes object (along with the path of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>) to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要应用此类操作，初始化 ImageAttributes 对象，并将传递该 ImageAttributes 对象的路径 (的路径以及<xref:System.Drawing.Image>) 到<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Clears the brush color-remap table of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 清除此画笔颜色重新映射表<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify one color-remap table for the default category, a different color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the brush category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以指定为默认类别的一个颜色重新映射表、 位图类别中，不同的颜色重新映射表和仍为画笔类别的不同的颜色重新映射表。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the brush category, the default settings apply to the brush category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定为画笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于画笔类别。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a default remap table that converts red to green, and you specify a default gamma value of 1.8.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你指定默认重新映射表将红色转换为绿色，并指定 1.8 默认伽玛值。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetBrushRemapTable%2A> method, the default remap table (red to green) and the default gamma value (1.8) will not apply to brushes.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetBrushRemapTable%2A>方法，默认重新映射表 （红色为绿色） 和默认伽玛值 (1.8) 将不会应用于画笔。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetBrushRemapTable%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you later call the ClearBrushRemapTable method, the brush category will not revert to the default remap table; rather, the brush category will have no remap table.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更高版本调用 ClearBrushRemapTable 方法时，画笔类别不会还原为默认重新映射表;相反，画笔类别都包含没有重新映射表。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the brush category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the brush category will have no gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 同样，画笔类别将恢复为默认伽玛值。相反，画笔类别都包含没有伽玛值。

trans-unit.source: Clears the color key (transparency range) for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 为默认类别清除颜色键 （透明范围）。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify one color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为默认类别的一个颜色键、 位图类别中，不同的颜色键和仍为钢笔类别不同的颜色键。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。

trans-unit.source: Clears the color key (transparency range) for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 为指定类别清除颜色键 （透明范围）。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify one color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为默认类别的一个颜色键、 位图类别中，不同的颜色键和仍为钢笔类别不同的颜色键。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a default color key that makes any color with a red component from 200 through 255 transparent, and you specify a default gamma value of 1.8.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你指定使任何颜色与 200 到 255 之间的红色组件透明，默认颜色键并指定 1.8 默认伽玛值。

trans-unit.source: If you set the color key of the pen category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A> method, the default color key and the default gamma value will not apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过调用设置钢笔类别的颜色键<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A>方法、 默认颜色键和默认伽玛值将不会应用于钢笔。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you later clear the pen color key by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearColorKey%2A> method, the pen category will not revert to the default color key; rather, the pen category will have no color key.
trans-unit.target: 如果稍后要清除的钢笔颜色键通过调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearColorKey%2A>方法，钢笔类别不会还原为默认颜色键; 相反，钢笔类别将具有任何颜色键。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearColorKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 同样，钢笔类别将恢复为默认伽玛值。相反，钢笔类别都包含没有伽玛值。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the color key is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 一个元素<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定为其清除颜色键的类别。

trans-unit.source: Clears the color-adjustment matrix for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 清除默认类别的颜色调整矩阵。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a color-adjustment matrix and a gamma value for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你指定的颜色调整矩阵和灰度值为默认类别。

trans-unit.source: If you set a color-adjustment matrix for the pen category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A> method, the default color-adjustment matrix will not apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过调用设置钢笔类别的颜色调整矩阵<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A>方法，默认颜色调整矩阵将不应用于钢笔。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you later clear the pen color-adjustment matrix by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearColorMatrix%2A> method, the pen category will not revert to the default adjustment matrix; rather, the pen category will have no adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更高版本调用来清除钢笔颜色调整矩阵<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearColorMatrix%2A>方法，钢笔类别不会还原到默认调整矩阵; 相反，钢笔类别就可以不调整矩阵。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearColorMatrix%2A>

trans-unit.source: Disables gamma correction for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 禁用灰度校正为默认类别。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a gamma value for the default category, a different gamma value for the bitmap category, and still a different gamma value for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为默认类别伽玛值、 位图类别中，另一个伽玛值和仍为钢笔类别另一个伽玛值。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.

trans-unit.source: Disables gamma correction for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 禁用灰度校正为指定类别。

trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为默认类别伽玛值、 位图类别中，另一个伽玛值和仍为钢笔类别另一个伽玛值。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, then the default settings apply to the pen category.

trans-unit.target: 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a gamma value and a color-adjustment matrix for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你指定了伽玛值和为默认类别的颜色调整矩阵。

trans-unit.source: If you set the gamma value for the pen category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetGamma%2A> method, the default gamma value will not apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置钢笔类别的伽玛值通过调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetGamma%2A>方法，默认伽玛值将不应用于钢笔。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetGamma%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you later clear the pen gamma value by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearGamma%2A> method, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更高版本清除钢笔伽玛值通过调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearGamma%2A>方法，钢笔类别不会还原为默认伽玛值，而是，钢笔类别将不伽玛值。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearGamma%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default color-adjustment matrix; rather, the pen category will have no color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 同样，钢笔类别不会还原到默认颜色调整矩阵;相反，钢笔类别都包含没有颜色调整矩阵。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which gamma correction is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 一个元素<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定将禁用灰度校正的类别。

trans-unit.source: Clears the <xref uid="langword_csharp_NoOp" name="NoOp" href=""></xref> setting for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 清除<xref uid="langword_csharp_NoOp" name="NoOp" href=""></xref>设置为默认类别。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.

trans-unit.source: You can disable color adjustment for the default category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过调用来禁用为默认类别的颜色调整<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>

trans-unit.source: Later, you can reinstate color adjustment for the default category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 更高版本，则可以通过调用恢复为默认类别的颜色调整<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A>

trans-unit.source: The color adjustment then returns to what was in place before the call to <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 然后，将返回到已存在的对<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>调用之前设置此颜色调整

trans-unit.source: Clears the <xref uid="langword_csharp_NoOp" name="NoOp" href=""></xref> setting for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 清除<xref uid="langword_csharp_NoOp" name="NoOp" href=""></xref>设置为指定类别。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: You can disable color adjustment for a certain category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过调用来禁用某些类别的颜色调整<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>

trans-unit.source: Later, you can reinstate color adjustment for that category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 更高版本，则可以通过调用来恢复该类别的颜色调整<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A>

trans-unit.source: The color adjustment then returns to what was in place before the call to <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Clears the CMYK (cyan-magenta-yellow-black) output channel setting for the default category.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify an output channel for the default category and a different output channel for the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以指定为默认类别输出通道和位图类别的不同的输出通道。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定位图类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于位图类别。

trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定位图类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于位图类别。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify an output channel and an adjustment matrix for the default category.

trans-unit.source: If you set the output channel for the bitmap category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> method, the default output channel will not apply to bitmaps.

trans-unit.source: If you later clear the bitmap output channel by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearOutputChannel%2A> method, the bitmap category will not revert to the default output channel; rather, the bitmap category will have no output channel setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更高版本清除位图通过调用的输出通道<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearOutputChannel%2A>方法，位图类别不会还原为默认输出通道; 相反，位图类别将具有任何输出通道设置。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearOutputChannel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the bitmap category will not revert to the default color-adjustment matrix; rather, the bitmap category will have no color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 同样，位图类别不会还原到默认颜色调整矩阵;相反，位图类别都包含没有颜色调整矩阵。

trans-unit.target: 一个元素<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定为其清除输出通道设置的类别。

trans-unit.source: Clears the threshold value for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 清除默认类别的阈值值。

trans-unit.source: The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component.
trans-unit.target: 阈值是一个介于 0 到 1，指定每个颜色组件的分界点。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the threshold is set to 0.7, and suppose you are rendering a color whose red, green, and blue components are 230, 50, and 220, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设的阈值设置为 0.7，并且假设呈现一种颜色的红色、 绿色和蓝色分量 230、 50，分别为和 220。

trans-unit.source: The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x255, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity).
trans-unit.target: 红色的组件 (230) 大于 0.7 x 255, 因此红色组件将更改为 255 （最大亮度）。

trans-unit.source: The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0.
trans-unit.target: 绿色的组件 (50) 小于 0.7 x 255,，因此绿色组件将更改为 0。

trans-unit.source: The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255.
trans-unit.target: 蓝色分量 (220) 大于 0.7 x 255, 因此蓝色组件将更改为 255。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法离开<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>中不可用状态。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 调用 Dispose 后，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>占用。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 始终调用释放在发布到<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>最后一个引用之前

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它所使用的资源之前，不会释放垃圾回收器调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 允许该对象尝试释放资源并在被垃圾回收回收之前执行其他清理操作。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the colors in a palette according to the adjustment settings of a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 调整根据指定类别的调整设置调色板中的颜色。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color-remap table for the default category, a different color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为默认类别的颜色重新映射表、 位图类别中，不同的颜色重新映射表和仍为钢笔类别的不同的颜色重新映射表。

trans-unit.source: When you call the GetAdjustedPalette method, you can specify the adjustment category that is used to adjust the palette colors.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 GetAdjustedPalette 方法时，你可以指定用于调整的调色板颜色调整类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you pass <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the GetAdjustedPalette method, the adjustment settings of the bitmap category are used to adjust the palette colors.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你通过<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>GetAdjustedPalette 方法中，使用位图类别的调整设置以调整的调色板颜色。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette"></xref> that on input contains the palette to be adjusted, and on output contains the adjusted palette.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette"> </xref>输入，其中包含要进行调整的调色板并在输出时包含已调整的调色板。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category whose adjustment settings will be applied to the palette.
trans-unit.target: 一个元素<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定其调整设置将应用于调色板的类别。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-remap table for the brush category.
trans-unit.target: 画笔类别的设置颜色重新映射表。

trans-unit.source: A color-remap table is an array of <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structures.
trans-unit.target: 颜色重新映射表是一个数组<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>结构。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structure has two <xref:System.Drawing.Color> objects: one that specifies an old color and one that specifies a corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>结构具有两个<xref:System.Drawing.Color>对象︰ 一个指定旧的颜色，另一个指定相应的新颜色。</xref:System.Drawing.Color> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>

trans-unit.source: During rendering, any color that matches one of the old colors in the remap table is changed to the corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: 呈现过程中，重新映射表中的旧颜色之一匹配的任何颜色将变为对应的新颜色。

trans-unit.source: Calling the SetBrushRemapTable method has the same effect as passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用 SetBrushRemapTable 方法具有相同的效果与传入<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>到<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: The specified remap table applies to items in metafiles that are filled with a brush.
trans-unit.target: 指定重新映射表适用于使用画笔填充的图元文件中的项。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to be used only with metafiles.
trans-unit.target: 此方法旨在仅用于图元文件。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color key for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 设置为默认类别的颜色键。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the high and low color-key values so that a range of colors can be made transparent.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置的上限和下限的颜色键的值，以便可以透明进行的颜色范围。

trans-unit.source: Any color that has each of its three components (red, green, blue) between the corresponding components of the high and low color keys is made transparent.
trans-unit.target: 任何具有每个相应的各个组件之间的高和较低的颜色键其三个组件 （红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 的颜色由透明。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为默认类别的颜色键、 位图类别中，不同的颜色键和仍为钢笔类别不同的颜色键。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。

trans-unit.source: The low color-key value.
trans-unit.target: 低颜色键值。

trans-unit.source: The high color-key value.
trans-unit.target: 高颜色键值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color key (transparency range) for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 为指定类别设置颜色键 （透明范围）。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the high and low color-key values so that a range of colors can be made transparent.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置的上限和下限的颜色键的值，以便可以透明进行的颜色范围。

trans-unit.source: Any color that has each of its three components (red, green, blue) between the corresponding components of the high and low color keys is made transparent.
trans-unit.target: 任何具有每个相应的各个组件之间的高和较低的颜色键其三个组件 （红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 的颜色由透明。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为默认类别的颜色键、 位图类别中，不同的颜色键和仍为钢笔类别不同的颜色键。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你指定为默认类别的调整设置的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you set the color key for the pen category by passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A> method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过将传递设置钢笔类别的颜色键<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>到<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A>方法，无默认调整设置将应用于钢笔。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: The low color-key value.
trans-unit.target: 低颜色键值。

trans-unit.source: The high color-key value.
trans-unit.target: 高颜色键值。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the color key is set.
trans-unit.target: 一个元素<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定为其设置颜色键的类别。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-adjustment matrix and the grayscale-adjustment matrix for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 设置颜色调整矩阵和灰度调整矩阵为默认类别。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify adjustment matrices for the default category, different adjustment matrices for the bitmap category, and still different adjustment matrices for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以指定为默认类别的调整矩阵、 针对位图类别中，另一个调整矩阵和钢笔类别的另一个调整矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。

trans-unit.source: Calling the SetColorMatrices method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrices%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag%29?displayProperty=fullName> method and passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName> for the `flags` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 调用 SetColorMatrices 方法等效于调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrices%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法并传入<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName>为`flags`参数。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrices%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName> specifies that all colors (including grays) are adjusted by the color-adjustment matrix, not the grayscale-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName>指定所有颜色 （包括灰色） 都调整通过颜色调整矩阵，不灰度调整矩阵。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the grayscale-adjustment matrix passed to this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 因此，传递给此方法的灰度调整矩阵不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 颜色调整矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The grayscale-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 灰度调整矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-adjustment matrix for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 默认类别的设置颜色调整矩阵。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color-adjustment matrix for the default category, a different color-adjustment matrix for the bitmap category, and still a different color-adjustment matrix for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以指定为默认类别的颜色调整矩阵、 位图类别中，不同的颜色调整矩阵和仍为钢笔类别的不同的颜色调整矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。

trans-unit.source: The color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 颜色调整矩阵。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag"></xref> that specifies the type of image and color that will be affected by the color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 一个元素<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag"> </xref> ，它指定的图像和将受颜色调整矩阵的颜色的类型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-adjustment matrix for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 指定类别的设置颜色调整矩阵。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color-adjustment matrix for the default category, a different color-adjustment matrix for the bitmap category, and still a different color-adjustment matrix for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以指定为默认类别的颜色调整矩阵、 位图类别中，不同的颜色调整矩阵和仍为钢笔类别的不同的颜色调整矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你指定为默认类别的调整设置的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you set the color-adjustment matrix for the pen category by passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A> method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过将传递设置钢笔类别的颜色调整矩阵<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>到<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A>方法，无默认调整设置将应用于钢笔。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: The color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 颜色调整矩阵。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag"></xref> that specifies the type of image and color that will be affected by the color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 一个元素<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag"> </xref> ，它指定的图像和将受颜色调整矩阵的颜色的类型。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the color-adjustment matrix is set.
trans-unit.target: 一个元素<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定为其设置颜色调整矩阵的类别。

trans-unit.source: Sets the gamma value for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 设置伽玛值为默认类别。

trans-unit.source: Typical values for the `gamma` parameter are from 1.0 to 2.2; however, values from 0.1 to 5.0 could prove useful in some circumstances.
trans-unit.target: 典型值为`gamma`参数都是从 1.0 到 2.2; 但是，从 0.1 到 5.0 的值无法证明在某些情况下有用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a gamma value for the default category, a different gamma value for the bitmap category, and still a different gamma value for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定为默认类别伽玛值、 位图类别中，另一个伽玛值和仍为钢笔类别另一个伽玛值。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。

trans-unit.source: Gamma values outside the usual range may be useful for old CRT monitors or for monitors that are in unusual lighting conditions, such as industrial environments or window displays.
trans-unit.target: 常用的范围之外的伽玛值可能对于旧 CRT 监视器，或者异常的照明条件，如工业环境或窗口会显示中的监视器。

trans-unit.source: The gamma correction value.
trans-unit.target: 灰度校正值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the gamma value for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 设置伽玛值为指定类别。

trans-unit.source: Typical values for the `gamma` parameter are from 1.0 to 2.2; however, values from 0.1 to 5.0 could prove useful in some circumstances.
trans-unit.target: 典型值为`gamma`参数都是从 1.0 到 2.2; 但是，从 0.1 到 5.0 的值无法证明在某些情况下有用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the CMYK (cyan-magenta-yellow-black) output channel for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CMYK （青色-洋红色-黄色-黑色） 输出通道为默认类别。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> method to convert an image to a CMYK color space and examine the intensities of one of the CMYK color channels.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>方法将图像转换为 CMYK 色彩空间并检查之一 CMYK 颜色通道的强度。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you create an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object and set its bitmap output channel to <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你创建的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象，并将到<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag>。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag>其位图输出通道</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: If you pass the path of that <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method, the cyan component of each pixel is calculated, and each pixel in the rendered image is a shade of gray that indicates the intensity of its cyan channel.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递的路径<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象传递给<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法，计算每个像素的蓝绿色部分，并且在呈现的图像中的每个像素的阴影属于灰色指示其青色通道的强度。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can render images that indicate the intensities of the magenta, yellow, and black channels.
trans-unit.target: 同样，你可以呈现指示洋红色，黄色，和黑色通道强度的图像。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you write code that performs the following steps: 1.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你编写代码来执行以下步骤︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Drawing.Image>.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will use the color-profile file to calculate the cyan component of each pixel in the image, and each pixel in the rendered image will be a shade of gray that indicates the intensity of its cyan channel.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]将使用颜色配置文件来计算在图中，每个像素的蓝绿色部分，每个像素中呈现的图像将喜欢的灰色指示其青色通道的强度。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify an output channel color-profile file for the default category and a different output channel color-profile file for the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以指定为默认类别输出通道颜色配置文件和不同的输出通道颜色配置文件为位图类别。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定位图类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于位图类别。

trans-unit.source: The path name of a color-profile file.
trans-unit.target: 颜色配置文件路径名称。

trans-unit.source: If the color-profile file is in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Spool\Drivers\Color directory, this parameter can be the file name.
trans-unit.target: 如果颜色配置文件位于 %SystemRoot%\System32\Spool\Drivers\Color 目录中，此参数可以为的文件名称。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this parameter must be the fully qualified path name.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此参数必须是完全限定的路径名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the output channel color-profile file for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 指定类别的设置输出通道颜色配置文件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> methods to convert an image to a CMYK (cyan-magenta-yellow-black) color space and examine the intensities of one of the CMYK color channels.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>将图像转换为 CMYK （青色-洋红色-黄色-黑色） 色彩空间和检查的其中一个 CMYK 强度方法颜色通道。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you write code that performs the following steps: 1.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你编写代码来执行以下步骤︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Drawing.Image>.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Pass the path name of a color profile file to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 传递到一个颜色配置文件的路径名称<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pass the paths of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> and <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 路径传递<xref:System.Drawing.Image>和<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象添加到<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will use the color-profile file to calculate the cyan component of each pixel in the image, and each pixel in the rendered image will be a shade of gray that indicates the intensity of its cyan channel.

trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定位图类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于位图类别。

trans-unit.target: 只要你指定的颜色调整或某些类别的灰度调整设置，默认调整设置将不再适用于该类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你指定为默认类别的调整设置的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you set the output channel color-profile file for the bitmap category by passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to bitmaps.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过将传递设置输出通道颜色配置文件为位图类别<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>到<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>方法，无默认调整设置将应用于位图。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-remap table for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 默认类别的设置颜色重新映射表。

trans-unit.source: A color-remap table is an array of <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structures.
trans-unit.target: 颜色重新映射表是一个数组<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>结构。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structure has two <xref:System.Drawing.Color> objects: one that specifies an old color and one that specifies a corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>结构具有两个<xref:System.Drawing.Color>对象︰ 一个指定旧的颜色，另一个指定相应的新颜色。</xref:System.Drawing.Color> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>

trans-unit.source: During rendering, any color that matches one of the old colors in the remap table is changed to the corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: 呈现过程中，重新映射表中的旧颜色之一匹配的任何颜色将变为对应的新颜色。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color remap for the default category, a color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以指定默认类别、 位图类别的颜色重新映射表和仍为钢笔类别的不同的颜色重新映射表颜色重新映射。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。

trans-unit.source: Sets the threshold (transparency range) for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 设置为默认类别的阈值 （透明范围）。

trans-unit.source: The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component.
trans-unit.target: 阈值是一个介于 0 到 1，指定每个颜色组件的分界点。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the threshold is set to 0.7, and suppose you are rendering a color whose red, green, and blue components are 230, 50, and 220, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设的阈值设置为 0.7，并且假设呈现一种颜色的红色、 绿色和蓝色分量 230、 50，分别为和 220。

trans-unit.source: The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x255, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity).
trans-unit.target: 红色的组件 (230) 大于 0.7 x 255, 因此红色组件将更改为 255 （最大亮度）。

trans-unit.source: The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0.
trans-unit.target: 绿色的组件 (50) 小于 0.7 x 255,，因此绿色组件将更改为 0。

trans-unit.source: The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255.
trans-unit.target: 蓝色分量 (220) 大于 0.7 x 255, 因此蓝色组件将更改为 255。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>对象维护的五个调整类别的颜色和灰度设置︰ 默认、 位图、 画笔、 笔、 和文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a threshold for the default category, a threshold for the bitmap category, and still a different threshold for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以指定为默认类别阈值、 针对位图类别中，阈值和仍为钢笔类别一个不同的阈值。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色调整和灰度调整设置适用于不具有其自己的调整设置的所有类别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你永远不会指定钢笔类别任何调整设置，默认设置应用于钢笔类别。

trans-unit.source: A real number that specifies the threshold value.
trans-unit.target: 指定的阈值的实数。

trans-unit.target: 一个元素<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定为其设置颜色阈值的类别。

trans-unit.source: Sets the wrap mode that is used to decide how to tile a texture across a shape, or at shape boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 设置环绕模式用于决定如何磁贴纹理到一个形状，或到形状的边界。

trans-unit.source: A texture is tiled across a shape to fill it in when the texture is smaller than the shape it is filling.
trans-unit.target: 当纹理小于它所填充的形状时填写某个形状上平铺纹理。

trans-unit.source: Calling the SetWrapMode method is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetWrapMode%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode%2CSystem.Drawing.Color%29> and passing <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for the `color` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 调用 SetWrapMode 方法等效于调用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetWrapMode%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode%2CSystem.Drawing.Color%29>并传递<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>为`color`参数。</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetWrapMode%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode%2CSystem.Drawing.Color%29>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName> specifies the color of pixels outside of a rendered image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>指定呈现图像外部的像素的颜色。</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This color is visible if the mode parameter is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode> and the source rectangle passed to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method is larger than the image itself.
trans-unit.target: 此颜色是可见的如果模式参数设置为<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode>和源矩形传递给<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法大于图像本身。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode>

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area.
trans-unit.target: 一个元素<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"> </xref> ，它指定如何重复的图像副本用于平铺区域。
